Entries.default: "Something touched my leg! Captain, we should leave!"
"Nice that they got a whole room where their skeletons can relax."
"There be a whole lot of hostile down here, cap. Be keeping a weather eye open."
"You hear that? Whispers in the darkness. Whispers from the grave."
"Do you feel that, Watcher? Thoughts on the air. Like snow flurries with sharp edges."
